name: The Flying Dutchman (itch)
description:
GameDevTv Game Jam 2022 - "Death is only the beginning" Game Description

A simple merchant ship lost at sea is destroyed by pirates and is reborn as the Flying Dutchman.

  • Game Unity: https://unity.com/
  • Sprite Editor: https://www.aseprite.org/
  • Audio Editor: https://famistudio.org/
Non-Custom Assets
  • Pixel Pirate Font: https://www.dafont.com/pixel-pirate.font
Contributors
  • Romain Saulas - Art and Development
  • John McDowell - Development
Notes

Due to external time factors only the "tutorial" level was submitted, but the goal is to continue development.
